youtube.title: How Gastric Sleeve Surgery Works: Step-by-Step Animation
youtube.description: Discover the medical process of vertical sleeve gastrectomy (VSG). This 3D animation shows how weight-loss surgery reshapes the stomach to restrict food intake and aid in metabolic health. Perfect for biology students and those curious about bariatric procedures.
